ref.mixed-citation: Hubbell, J. H. & Seltzer, S. M. Tables of X-Ray Mass Attenuation Coefficients and Mass Energy-Absorption Coefficients from 1 keV to 20 MeV for Elements Z = 1 to 92 and 48 Additional Substances of Dosimetric Interest, NIST Standard Reference Database 126, version 1.4 (National Institute of Standards and Technology, Gaithersburg, MD, 2004).
